name: Pleiades: #420 Stargaze It
description:
A small game inspired by the Magic Realism bot tweet: "There is a drug dealer in Paris who can get you high on constellations."

Play as a young anthropomorphic black hole just looking for a high. Turns out there's just a guy that can supply on the streets of Paris. 

I do not own the rights to the song "Laurence, the First Vicar." Those belong to From Software and Sony Entertainment. Composers: Ryan Amon, Tsukasa Saitoh, Michael Wandmacher, Yuka Kitamura, Cris Velasco, Nobuyoshi Suzuki. This is protected under transformative art act.  All other sounds from FreeSounds.org.

Space photo also belongs to Space Warren. http://www.storywarren.com/space/
